name: Master of Rogues - The Seven Artifacts
name_original: Master of Rogues - The Seven Artifacts
description:
Master of Rogues - The Seven Artifacts is a Dungeon-Crawler, Roguelike-like RPG.
Every Game is different, with randomized Levels, enemies, three different characters and over 130 Unique Items to find.

Game features:
- generates every time you play an unique labyrinth full of items and monsters
- four different level layouts
- masses of monsters
- magic spells
- different bosses
- roguelike style game
- permadeath or softcore mode is chooseable in game options
- three different character classes – the orc, the undead and the human
